headline: Why Moderna (MRNA) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of biotechnology company Moderna (NASDAQ:MRNA) fell 4.8% in the afternoon session after competitors Pfizer and BioNTech announced positive topline results for their updated 2025-2026 COVID-19 vaccine formula. The data from Pfizer and BioNTech showed their vaccine produced a robust immune response, signaling continued strong competition in the COVID-19 vaccine market.
